ai-tha-ap259:1.3_0: I saw the best of ascetics,
ai-tha-ap259:1.4_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap259:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap259:4.3_0: The fire neither too hot nor too cold,
ai-tha-ap259:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap259:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mantāṇiputta.
ai-tha-ap259:7.1_0: attacked by reduction, the seventh section.
